articles.title: Brain Channels “Stopped in Time” Reveal How We Think and Learn - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Scientists used advanced cryo-EM imaging to reveal how glutamate activates brain receptors, paving the way for new neurological treatments. To better understand how brain cells communicate using chemical signals, scientists have used a highly specialized micr…
